Articles.Content:
On Minmus. After deploying the rover it ended up on its butt. Having Val push it caused a kraken event that sent it flying. When it landed it bounced and spun wildly. After waiting a minute for it to settle down, I used time warp (attempting the KSP1 time-warp-stops-rotation cheat). The rover vanished from the game entirely- not even an explosion.

(Post- patch 1.)
